title: Replit
description: Implemented SSR routes, priority image loading, and realtime collaboration UX polishing
outcome: 30% faster FCP, improved new user signups by 18%
challenge: Replit needed to improve their frontend performance and user onboarding experience to compete with emerging AI-powered coding platforms.
solution: Redesigned the frontend architecture with SSR implementation, optimized image loading strategies, and enhanced real-time collaboration features.

title: DocAnalyzer
role: Enterprise onboarding UI and document parsing pipeline
description: Built enterprise onboarding UI, document parsing pipeline integration, multi-format uploads and secure SSO
challenge: Enterprise clients needed a streamlined way to onboard large document repositories with secure access controls.
solution: Created a comprehensive onboarding flow with multi-format document parsing, secure SSO integration, and automated processing pipelines.

title: Wispr Flow
role: Voice-first conversion flow and real-time STT
description: Voice-first conversion flow, improved dictation UX, and integrated real-time STT
outcome: 3x increase in daily active users in target cohort
challenge: Users struggled with traditional text input methods for voice-to-text applications, leading to low engagement.
solution: Developed a voice-first interface with real-time speech-to-text processing and seamless mobile SDK integration.

title: Galen AI
description: Built health-data dashboard, wearables ingestion pipeline, secure patient data model
outcome: Streamlined clinician workflows and cut data sync time by 65%
challenge: Healthcare providers needed a unified platform to aggregate patient data from multiple wearables and health systems.
solution: Created a HIPAA-compliant dashboard with real-time data ingestion, secure patient data modeling, and streamlined clinician workflows.

title: Plexe
role: ML model management UI and deployment pipelines
description: Designed ML model management UI, prompt editor, and model deployment pipelines
outcome: Faster model iteration cycles and improved MLops adoption
challenge: AI teams needed a unified platform to manage, deploy, and iterate on machine learning models efficiently.
solution: Built a comprehensive MLops platform with model management UI, prompt editing capabilities, and automated deployment pipelines.

title: Tasawwur RTC
description: High-performance, open-source RTC platform with sub-200ms latency, built with WebRTC, Kotlin/C++, and Java Spring Boot
challenge: Building low-latency, reliable video calling is a massive engineering challenge that requires deep expertise in distributed systems and real-time communication.
solution: Created a comprehensive RTC platform with Android SDK, scalable backend services, and developer-friendly APIs that handle all the complexity.
